item.description:
Thias was suggested by Vivian Lee: Hey all! The MIT Asian Dance Team is having their fall 2010 showcase in a few weeks. They do a lot of traditional Chinese dance in addition to modern dance, and I was wondering if anyone wanted to come?

Saturday, December 11, 2010, 6-8pm
Kresge Auditorium, MIT campus
$5 in advance/$7 at the door for MIT members
$10 for non-MIT members

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: MIT Asian Dance Team showcase
